website_summaries.verdict: Easy to assemble and serves as a neutral design piece in your room.
pros: Customers love this frame so much, some have purchased more than one
Appreciated for its value, simplicity and overall comfort
A great addition for a remodeling project
We love the high-end look at an affordable price point
cons: This is a low-sitting frame and needs a box spring mattress

customer_reviews.title: Started to love the bed frame and though it was very nice
customer_reviews.text: Started to love the bed frame and though it was very nice, then it completely started to fall apart the slacks broke and the side where the wood was holding up the bed completely came off and I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzlyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed, easy to assemble. Looks great in our coastal themed guest room.
customer_reviews.author: nj_captiva

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: What a true nightmare! I ordered this product and is soon as it arrived I arrange for a handyman to come over and put it together for me. After he was halfway done he saw that the headboard had nail place things that were in the incorrect spot and couldn’t finish putting the bed together. Not only did I have to pay the handyman for his time and he didn’t even get to put the bed together but I also had to pay him to help me return it because it was so heavy. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: decent frame for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great look, easy to assemble (even with a broken hand) Cons: not much headboard padding at all. Had to toss extra pillows when watching a movie in bed. Side rails didn't fit flush together. The lack of pilot holes when attaching the slats made it difficult due to my broken hand, but I managed. Thoughts: definitely needs 2-3 extra slats. 4 for a king size bed isn't enough to support the box spring / mattress properly. Overall; I personally wouldn't buy it again. The quality of it is cheap and for the price I feel it could've been made better. I recommend it if people are looking for something along the lines though. Looks great and made of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Bed / baseball glove seat??? Who can tell???
customer_reviews.text: Well I ordered the Crown Mark Upholstered Panel Bed in gray....not sure how my daughter will stretch on this but pretty sure this isn’t the bed I ordered- just sayin....lol
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearance, doesn't appear sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When I received this bed in the mail, I thought it would be of similar quality to one we purchased for my daughter 2 years ago. I was wrong! There are only 5 flimsy slats on this bed, so unless you have a box spring, your mattress might not stay supported. We personally purchased a memory foam mattress, so there is no way this bed will support it. My husband will be making extra supports. There is also a large gap between the mattress and the baseboard as well as the height (between the mattress and bottom of headboard). So I would suggest going with a tall mattress, or again a box spring and mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Donlay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Shown
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful, and easy to put together. It is exactly as represented by the seller. All the hardware is included and the unit is well packed. Ours arrived ahead of schedule. The color is very neutral and will go with any color walls. The frame is well constructed. I can't say enough about this product. I will be getting another one for our other guest room. Great seller to deal with too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sloane

customer_reviews.title: I have a foundation, not a box spring.
customer_reviews.text: This the most beautiful bed I have ever had. It assembled perfectly, my foundation fit the bed perfectly. It had supports around the edges, and down the center. I purchased more supports....but I did not need them. Not one issue...quality is super. My 14" mattress, with a 9 inch foundation rocks. I really love this frame..and would not change it for a minute. The stone color is very much like linen. Looks natural. Love it...great product. Do not listen to other reviews....a great bed with everything I could wish.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin B.

customer_reviews.title: I love my panel bed
customer_reviews.text: I love my panel bed. It looks wonderful in my newly remodeled bedroom. I did put on a different headboard and had no problem in making the change. It is a beautiful bed just as it arrived, my changing out the headboard was a decorative decision and not because it was not lovely as is!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: BAD.
customer_reviews.text: The head board is absolutely beautiful . We had missing screws and the support boards were WAY too short. We had to go out and get some made that were the right length. I’m very disappointed that we had to go out and buy needed items for it when I just paid for this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexiss

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of trash. My 4 year old nephew was sleeping and the bed COLLAPSED. The mattress then hit the floor and my nephew was TERRIFIED. It shakes, it makes noises, the screws have come loose and Amazon's solution was to give me $50 because I told them this POS was too large for me to find a box and ship back! Are you going to have one of your mail carriers come pick this trash up? I told Amazon M O N T H S ago about this piece of garbage but of course nothing was done lol. Over this website and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Infinite Fields

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for staging a home. It looks nice for what I need. I don't use it for for sleeping. The headboard is a nice color just as pictured and described. Seems sturdy for normal use. But would not recommend for heavy set people unless it's reinforced. Great value for the price though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bed, best value for money. They also have really good customer service, I had some trasposrtatuin damage and my defected piece was replaced right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Not worth the money or the time it takes putting it together. I am more unhappy than I can say right now 😡. The left side of the headboard came apart at the seams two days after I put it together. I will be returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Really LOVE this bed! We had to buy our son a new frame because his old one got ruined on the move to another state. So, when I bought this bed I was skeptical since it is an online purchase and because it was such a low price, however, after putting it together and even sleeping in it myself a few times (when my kids took over my own bed and there was no room for me), gotta say, love it, sturdy and low to the ground which we prefer in bed frames. The only downside is you will need to buy support planks because the ones that come with it seem flimsy, otherwise no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Evan Rakestraw

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly, like the color of the headboard
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly, like the color of the headboard, comfy simple bed! Thank you for having this available at such an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: nanabanatzana

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple, and elegant for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is simple, elegant, and fits perfectly in the room. Fits a queen size bed. The price was pretty good for this size bed frame. It took longer to cut all the screws and nuts out of the packaging than it did to put it together. It took about 30 min to put it together after all the parts were out of the packaging. I would have given it 4 stars but the packaging was torn, there was a stain on the foot of the panel and a chip in the wood, in which I took a black sharpie and colored it in. The comforter I have on it covers the stain and the colored in chip.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but cute
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap *for now* bed frame and came across this one. It's super cute and really easy to put together but it's definitely a "get what you pay for" type of deal.. While putting it together I noticed a piece was a bit torn on the inside and it was supposed to be here by last Friday and just showed up today, Tuesday. It's not very durable but fingers crossed that it will last a little while
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: BED BROKEN ON THE FIRST NIGHT !!!
customer_reviews.text: It i cheaply made especially concerning the few slats provided for it to be a functional platform bed. If it wasn’t too much hassle to return it I wOULD. The bed broke in the center posting that’s supposed to support your weight on the FIRST NIGHT!!! I only weight 150 lbs!
customer_reviews.author: Baby A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bed
customer_reviews.text: It is an amazing bed , I have been using it for over 7 months now and so far it is really good. I haven’t gotten extra slat(s) yet , it makes a funny sound on one side but it doesn’t show any signs of damage ( I’m thinking it’s the box spring and not the bed ) . Over all this bed is worth every penny , I would buy it again . I might buy a slat in the future because putting a box spring and mattress may wear them out over time. Don’t think too much just buy it , it is also very easy to assemble .
customer_reviews.author: Ubams

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed with the intention of having a lower profile Incase my daughter rolls off by accident. Comes with 3 crazy flimsy slats. Mattress felt very uncomfortable and uneven and stinky between the slats. My mattress is a spring mattress, not a foam. SoI bought a whole row of slats. It helped a little but even with a puffy mattress topper and the slats, there’s a 16 inch gap between the bottom of the headboard and mattress. All my pillows fall right through and super dangerous for kids if they roll or fall through that gap. It’s the worst design ever.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Look at the photos closely before buying
customer_reviews.text: The bed was good, excellent for the price. Pretty as pictured and definitely an upgrade from my son's previous bed. However, the part that I didn't loved is that they picture it with the world's biggest mattress apparently, so when I bought a regular mattress to use, there is a big space between the mattress and the headboard that was empty so it looked ugly. I had to buy a box spring to fill the space, which wasn't the look I wanted, but it was easier than trying to return the mattress. More clarity in the description should be good about what is used on the photos in regards to mattress thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest particle board material bed I've ever purchased. I was looking to upgrade from my son's cheap Ikea bed but there is no comparison. The side boards are literally less than a half inch thick compared to 3" at Ikea. My pointer finger is the width of the side board. Absolutely save your money and go somewhere else. The so called "support beams" completely bend under palm amount of pressure and there's only 4 of them under the whole length of the bed. I couldn't even images someone sitting on the bed it will instantly break. Flimsy and cheap don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha S

customer_reviews.title: Know what you are getting into...
customer_reviews.text: Decent bed. The only issue that I had was that I didn't realize how low to the ground it was. That being said I'll buy a box spring and slip it in there- I like to be high off the ground. Now for the other issue- the one glaring issue- the small support that connects two of the pieces on the side cracked in half when I was putting it together. I am somewhat handy so I glued it and put it together with a bit of wood scrounged from the woodshop. This was the only negative issue I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Porter

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black, guess what I got- Not black. It's like Christmas you never know what your going to get. I order black and got grey it will work but wtf, how can anyone fu black. Also ITS CHEAPLY MADE, DOES NOT SEEM VERY STRONG, If I had an IKEA that would have been my first choice. It's going I to my guess bedroom so I really dont care, but not a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute chaos! Not only did the stands for the support beams not screw in place they just plain didn’t fit. Extremely frustrating, flimsy head bored even after screwing it in firmly. Took 2 extras days to get dropped off by UPS who kept saying it was “guaranteed to be delivered”. Directions and and pictures don’t match up. Waste of money and way to much aggravation with amazon and UPS to even get it.
customer_reviews.author: S.votava

customer_reviews.title: Nice, budget friendly piece
customer_reviews.text: I decided to redo my daughters room, and wanted to get a decent bed frame as I was tired of the bed and box spring sitting on the floor. I searched for a good bed frame that wouldn't cost me an arm and a leg. I decided on this one as it was a neutral color that could go with most wall colors. It also had pretty good reviews. It shipped and arrived fast, which is awesome being here in Hawaii! It was really easy to put together and took maybe 1/2 hour with myself and my husband working as a team. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EliseK808

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I was iffy about buying this frame because of some of the reviews, but i went for it and i dont regret it. I'm 5'1 and brought the box up 3 flights of stairs alone (i struggled) and it took me about half an hour to assemble the bed which was fairly easy. I must say though, the 4 little wooden slats definitely isn't sturdy enough to hold my matress and box spring but i was lucky enough to where my old metal bed frame slipped right into the frame so i do have the support needed now. I love the bed its cute especially for the price. No complaints :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vega

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for the price! Got a twin for a toddler room. Easy to assemble, sturdy for a twin/child IMO. It is low to the ground, keep that in mind. Also, with a box spring and a 6” mattress there is still a few inch gap from the headboard to the actual mattress. So if you don’t want a gap to show, be sure to buy at least a 10-12” mattress since the headboard does not have a adjustable height.
customer_reviews.author: zzztonyzzz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bed but...
customer_reviews.text: The headboard is pretty but the photo is deceiving . It’s very low to the ground, almost on the ground. So In the photo it shows a mattress (no box spring ) and the bed is a decent height . When in reality there is a huge one foot gap between the 10 inch mattress and the bottom of the headboard. There is zero storage underneath the frame because it basically rests on the floor. We will Probably end up buying a box spring to make this bed work. But that is not the purpose of a platform bed.
customer_reviews.author: Avid shopper123

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bed frame at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this turned out. I will say, I wish it didn’t involve using Allen wrenches to fasten the bolts together because it takes awhile. It’s pretty straight forward to assemble! Took about 40 minutes with another person helping. We did end up using a drill for the screws on the boards but otherwise you don’t need much outside help! Everything came packed inside the headboard which is awesome for space if you ever need to store it! I haven’t used the bed yet but I can tell it’s very sturdy. The fabric is nice and good quality. I didn’t have any rips, tears, or pieces missing. Overall, would purchase again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccah

customer_reviews.title: I like my new bed!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new bed. It was a little bit of a headache putting it together, but it worked out fine. The leather is smooth. The bed feels very sturdy. It does not come with a box spring so you definitely will need one. Otherwise you feel like you will actually sink onto the floor. The bed is only about an inch or two high so it's very close to the floor. After two days of literally sinking, I ended up having to purchase a box spring, so I'm happier with it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Idea Is Nice
customer_reviews.text: ...However, putting the wood slats on was an issue, and I still will need to find an alternative method of having support for my mattress. The slats just didn't seem to fit, and I tried adjusting the side boards, headboard..literally everything. I followed the instructions, and tried to level the frame out as much as possible, but it's just not comfortable. I liked the way the bed looked, and the headboard, but will need to find new slats or place a metal bed frame within the platform space to have support for my mattress. I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Janine L.

customer_reviews.title: With my 12" memory foam mattress, I needed a 7.5" box spring to level it to the headboards height.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this frame. However I ended up buying a 12 inch memory foam mattress believing that I did not need a box spring with a platform frame, and needed a 7.5" box spring. It was definitely misguiding, as I figured all platform frames did not need a boxspring. Sadly there was a 7.5 inch difference between my bed and the headboard. The gap between the 2 looked so tacky in my opinion I had to buy the box spring to bring the top of the mattress a little over the bottom of the headboard gap. Definitely a nice sturdy headboard, I just wish I had purchased a platform frame that worked with my memory foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bed! The parts to put it together are stirred in the back of the headboard. Just unzip it to get to them. It's extremely easy to assemble. As you can see in the pictures, the parts are covered in cheese cloth, so I used that as a barrier between the slats & my air mattress. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that while 2 Allen wrenches are included, there are some screws that require a plillips screwdriver. Everything else is wonderful! I saw some reviews that said it's wobbly, but if you take the time to stghten the screws properly, the bed is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Just My 5 Scense

customer_reviews.title: An honest review
customer_reviews.text: First of all I was very intimidated and debating on actually buying this bed frame but I’ve had it since November and I can honestly say it’s not bad, when I was first putting it together some things were a little hard to match up but my dad ended up putting it together, it does have some cheap wooden boards that are meant to hold the bed up but I would definitely recommend purchasing a box spring with this product all n all you get what you pay for. I don’t expect this bed to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Destinee

customer_reviews.title: Need a box spring but it's a bed
customer_reviews.text: Cant store anything under it. East to put together. But definitely need to get a box spring otherwise your mattress will try to fall through the slats because they are spaced to far apart. They need to either add more slats or include a box spring with the purchase. And this happened after 4 days of having it. Just by sitting on it. The board's are cheap wood and definitely need a box spring. Not only all of that it sits way to high where the pillows fall off behind it. I reccomend you do your research thoroughly before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Long

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware bag of screws and beat up wood.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so all the reviews seemed great but as soon as the item made it to my door it was in a box with one side open, and that’s not even the start of my problems. 1. There are no instruction papers in the box even though the box says instructions included 2. The bed is badly beat up broken wood, torn fabric. 3. All the prices where in the back of the headboard zipper compartment no packing materials. 4. All the screws and nuts where in a plastic hefty bag with no Alan wrench to even use to assemble the bed. 5. Only option was to return the item but the box was beat up and impossible to return.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The picture and wording indicates a spring mattress is not needed. Picture shows mattress even or higher than base of headboard - not so. The mattress is at least six inches below the headboard. Now we have the added expense of a spring mattress. DO NOT BUY THIS WITH THE EXPECTATION OF NOT NEEDING AN INNERSPRING MATTRESS!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Queen size bed, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is good looking, easy to assemble and at a very affordable price. After unboxing it looks like it might be a bit on the flimsy side but after assembly is all done it seems to be plenty sturdy enough. Just add your box springs, mattress and you have a great looking bed for not a lot of $$$$
customer_reviews.author: TerJon

customer_reviews.title: Just bad information ruined a 20th Birthday surprise.  😭
customer_reviews.text: Bought after reading reviews that no boxspring needed. Bought for my daughters Birthday now screwed feel horrible. It need a box spring. The headboard to mattress is at least 12 in. So u just see a huge gap hole and the mattress just keeps going through the wood slots. She is 19 and weighs 102 pds. Never should be this way. So upset and just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JanePier

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but terrible labeling
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the bed is very nice. The instructions were decent if you're able to look at the picture and figure out what goes where. The included tools and screws are NOT labeled which made it a little difficult to piece the bed together. Took about an hour to set up after deciphering the screws, location, and instructions. There are not pre-drilled holes for the wood screws/rails on the sides so I suggest using a drill. The bed is also lower than I expected, but overall will work fine for a child's room.
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain. Its cheap but a nice bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Okay price for a nice look. Packaged well and arrived with no damage despite small dents and rips to outer box. Cons: Picture for stone khaki shows a very light color, but the color I got is more like brown. All holes are drilled larger than screw diameter which causes some play if not tightened well. Found a small split on one leg for headboard. Support footings are minimal but sufficient for a child. Overall: Good price. Happy for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sapper253

customer_reviews.title: The bed won’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: I like the headboard, but man, putting it together wasn’t fun. Nearly everything wasn’t labeled so you have to sort it all out and remember the screws that say M6x25 are B and the slightly smaller ones, M6x20, are A. I’m praying the flimsy two by twos can hold the weight of two standard people in the bed. But the biggest thing is the STANDARD king size bed I just bought, doesn’t fit 🤣 by about two inches. So now my guest room looks pretty cheap after spending 155$ on a frame. Pretty upset. Now I have to figure out how to put sheets on it.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that it would be so easy to go on amazon and not have to go to the store and buy a crown Upholstered headboard with frame! Come on it doesn’t get better than that, and for $117! We went to many stores and for a full we were looking at 250 and up! Now we know from experience the the boards after never last so we use metal bed frames from our daughter’s previous bed, which if you look at the picture you can’t even tell! So thank you to the owners!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Roberts

customer_reviews.title: UNEVEN,  NOT A PLATFORM,  VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed as this bed was listed as a platform bed and is NOT. Due to dimensions being off, had to purchase lumber and fix dimensions for queen mattress to even fit, then had to cut legs of bed to even since the height of the head was significantly lower than the foot of bed thus leaving an inverted slope to sleep on. After a hundred extra dollars in supplies and about 3 hours extra work I have a bed. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a guest bedroom and figured I would take a chance on a ~$100 bedframe.The shipping was quick and everything was packaged really smartly. On panel had a small black mark on it that probably happened in packaging but I was able to get the spot out of the fabric. There were no tears and looks like good quality. Putting it together was pretty idiot proof and took my husband and I about an hour. Overall I am very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Fell completely apart in less than 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to set up. It was really cute. I loved the bed. I sleep with my 2 year old daughter only. I have a queen sized bed. Im about 150 lbs, 5’2. With that being said! There is no reason my damn bed is on the floor. The slacks broke. The feet broke maybe a week after sleeping on the bed. Complete waste of money. Im gonna throw the frame away and keep the headboard. I have bricks propping the bed up until i buy something else. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Cheap BED Frame quality to match
customer_reviews.text: Worst bed. It broke within 24 hours. Yes it is cheap but be careful what you expect. This was not a good product. I purchased for my slim 7 year old son and 1. It needs a box spring or something to lift it off the floor 2. It was cheap looking and feeling 3. Not with the price as it was so cheap or hassle to dis assemble and return
customer_reviews.author: Shanie

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic.
customer_reviews.text: The left and right sides of the boards which needs to be attached doesn't even level well. And the manufacturer has done a terrible job crafting the wood. My fingers got terrible cuts assembling the product. Only 4 wooden slates are given to hold my queen size mattress which is so heavy- seriously?? All in all, pathetically designed and manufactured
customer_reviews.author: Kajol

customer_reviews.title: Looks are good, not so much the quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty bed. It was very easy to assemble. I did it without any help. It does not have near enough support. Only 3 small slats on the bottom to support the mattress. When I stood on the bed to hang curtains, the mattress when thru the slats. I had to buy a box spring just so my son could lay in it without the mattress falling thru the 3 slats. With the box spring, we are satisfied but if you have a child that will bounce on it, it would probably break easily.
customer_reviews.author: DesDH

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for a guest bed
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made and of poor quality. I typed in pedestal bed and this came up. This is not a pedestal bed so in addition to a mattress, I also had to go buy a box spring! It has a “foot” along the side rails that I forget about and stub my toe on every time I make the bed. The materials and workmanship are so shoddy that it doesn’t feel stable. It slides all over the hardwood floor with the slightest of nudge, and to be honest, it’s so cheaply made that I’m scared when I roll over it’s going to break.
customer_reviews.author: kriston

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t the best bed frames honestly, leather on headboard was ripped on both when they arrived due to thin material on it, with all the pieces being packed into the headboard the way they are it should probably be better quality but they serve their purpose for the time being. Also says you don’t need a box spring but you absolutely do! Barely any support for the mattress we had to add our own and purchase box springs and even with that the headboard is still a bit too high up. Not a bad product but not something I would order again. Very easy to assemble though.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Starr

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when putting together. May seem flimsy
customer_reviews.text: So I’m a 27 year old who lives alone. I bought this after a month of looking around online for a bed. I was super excited because it was going to match my room decor perfectly. It’s hard to set up alone. And please get a screw driver before you start. It’s not as sturdy as it looks. After putting mine together it still is loose and feels like it’s gonna fall apart when I try moving my bed around or adjusting my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the price for sure. It's very durable and of good quality, and I highly recommend. I purchased it because it was low to the ground, so that my pets can't get under the bed, and it works great, as it's not on the floor, but low enough, so it's a beautiful presentation. And, it's easy to put together. I also have an adjustable bed, and the base sits in it just fine. So overall, a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tessra P.

customer_reviews.title: it's not sexy, in fact it's rather bland
customer_reviews.text: The bed was easy to assemble. I questioned the quality initially but found that the basic materials provided a sturdy enough foundation. You get what you pay for with this - it's not sexy, in fact it's rather bland but is budget friendly. I ordered the Stone Khaki, Queen. Color and size was accurate. If you're looking for an inexpensive way to furnish a temporary space or investment property, you can't beat the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but needs a box spring
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the look of the bed overall. For the price, I was a little skeptical. The studded headboard looks really nice. The downside is even though this says its a platform bed, it needs a box spring. I have a 12" memory foam mattress and there is a huge gap between the mattress and the bottom of the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie Wharam

customer_reviews.title: Returned without opening box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bed frame before studying reviews. Did not realize that this particular bed frame requires a box spring. I was wanting a platform type bed frame. Tried to cancel after seeing so many negative reviews but did not get my cancellation notice in on time to stop shipping. Returned this bed frame and reordered another that was a platform bed frame. Can't really speak to the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: It came with the back of the headboard damaged. This made it difficult to assemble because a panel was warped and I had to drill an extra piece of wood I had in place to help level it out. It can’t support a bed without a box frame of some sort. Even though the base feels sturdy the headboard is wobbly. Just need it to last us for a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kyli Goley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. The bed frame arrived in great condition and is exactly what I wanted. For the price, you can’t beat it! I selected the option for basically a scratch and dent box to save $20ish which makes me even happier with this purchase. The bed is sturdy but lightweight to move. I’m very happy I read a review to know all the material was zipped into the headboard, which is pretty crafty in my opinion. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is kind of crazy that we received a bed frame from Amazon. Assembly took a couple of hours for one person to complete. The bed looks great and it was a big upgrade from the cheap old fashioned metal bed frame that we always had. the hardware appears decent and it does feel solid. Probably not as solid as a full metal frame bed or a solid wood bed delivered by a furniture store. But for the money, it does the job and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Easier than Lincoln logs
customer_reviews.text: Assembling was easier than putting together Lincoln logs. Great bed! You will need a standard size box spring with the mattress otherwise you will have a gap. I purchased a short box spring but it was not tall enough to prevent the gap. I purchased a body pillow to cover the gap because my bed pillows kept getting jammed in the space. Doesn't move on hardwood floors or make any creaking sounds. A great stylish and sturdy bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, frail construction.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bed. The photos I posted are the bed support slats for the mattress and/or boxspring. There are only 4 of them... they are so thin they snap like toothpicks. 2 of the 4 were destroyed upon arrival of the bed.... they were coming apart in layers. The remainder of the bed frame is also very shoddy construction and doesn’t appear that it could even hold the weight of a child. Stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Blatt-Potts

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t take long for my husband to assemble for our guest bedroom. Color is a great neutral, if you add a couple planks for the box spring to sit on it will be much sturdier. You definitely need a box spring for this frame. A full size box spring doesn’t fit flush, there’s some space between the spring and bed frame. Would prefer it to fit snugly but not a deal breaker for the inexpensive price.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!! Headboard fell off!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review less than a year after purchase. I woke up to my daughter screaming because the headboard became unglued and fell on top of her. Whatever they use to glue the headboard on does not stay. I am absolutely horrified they would sell something so shoddy. She could’ve been seriously injured! Do not buy this product. My daughter is about 5’1 95 lbs. I honestly feel like I deserve every penny back for this piece of junk. Just stay away from this bed!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie a

customer_reviews.title: Box spring needed!
customer_reviews.text: This picture shown in the Amazon listing must be a thick top mattress because I definitely need a box spring for my average thickness mattress. My pillows are going to slide behind this headboard. There is a huge gap space where my mattress is below the bottom of the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: RHR3

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Seems sturdy enough for now but we're going to add some reinforcement wood just in case. The quality of the materials are actually not bad at all.. not the best out there but definitely good for $98! We got "stone" Save some coin and get stone instead of grey. It's pretty much grey w just a hint of ivory. Cant really tell otherwise. We have a box spring,mattress and foam, and topper on it and it fits well! We hope itll last us long!
customer_reviews.author: Glorious1721

customer_reviews.title: Get a box frame
customer_reviews.text: Requires box frame. Picture is misleading. Hurts my back with just the memory foam mattress. Also, I snapped on of the legs on the support beams below. I don't weigh a lot but did "fall" a little since my mattress sits so low. The gap from the mattress to the headboard is annoying, my pillows fall into it. Definitely get a box frame. Otherwise, a decent bed frame. Solid 3.5/5 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bosan Joe

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright for an “in between beds, bed”. It is poor quality,falls apart fairly easy especially with younger children and offers little to no support. The head board is basically a cardboard box supported by cheap ultra lightweight wood and fasteners. I bought two one for each of my middle children 9 and 10, these beds did not hold up for to long under normal and acceptable wear and tear less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Catalyst

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed, easy to put together, bonus secret stash spot!
customer_reviews.text: GET THIS BED. It is by far the easiest bed to put together I’ve assembled in quite some time - only requires 8 screws to secure foundation & is super sturdy. I’m so impressed with this bed... it even came in a not so huge box, and ALL THE THINGS WERE STORED IN A ZIP COMPARTMENT IN THE HEADBOARD!!!! Great hiding space back there, btw, if... you know, you got anything to hide 👐
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: VERY low to the ground! Not enough support slats.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress in the photo must be 20 inches tall. I have a 12 inch memory foam mattress that is not nearly tall enough for me to comfortably sit on the edge and put my shoes on. Which is ok.... But this bed only provides 4 slats. If you are my height at 5'9" your ass will rest right between the slats, leaving you feeling unsupported. I am going to pick up some wood at Home Depot to add 2 more slats. There is a reason most of these come with a lot of slats. 4 is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, deff need a 12 inch or more thick mattress, head board is high so it needs a box spring or a very thick mattress to be able to fill the gap between the headboard and frame. If your like me and use foam mattress without box spring under it, u WILL need a flat board to go over the beams, bc they only give you a couple slats and that's not enough to hold a foam mattress up without sinking. So we got a board to go over slats and that works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Sn0wWhiteQu33n

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is a two man job.
customer_reviews.text: This fits the bed well, doesn't make me feel like it's going to fall apart when I lay in it, and is very comfortable and even. But assembly is a two man job! With a lot of space! I did this in my ~300ft bedroom, with 10ft ceilings, with other furniture and our old bedframe in the room. It was terrible. The amount of times you have to go from one end to the next is unreal,
customer_reviews.author: Brad Murchison

customer_reviews.title: Do that with your money buying the headboard is awesome but that is all the frame is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Please do not purchase these I purchased two of them for my boys room and the pieces of wood that go across the bed frame to support the bed are cheap and break easily. I will not be returning but I will never order this product again. They need to tell people that the wood that supports the bed that goes across the bed frame is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Shawni Matisse

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY ANYTHING FROM AMAZON THEY LIE
customer_reviews.text: Its ok, not great, wife likes it well enough. All side rails are padded vinyl along with headboard. You will need box springs with this bed, I used plywood over the cross bracing to create a platform. Make sure your head board legs are straight, I would use a square to make sure, otherwise your braces may not fit due to headboard creating the actual width of bed at head.
customer_reviews.author: only126db

customer_reviews.title: Finally glad I I got bed assembled
customer_reviews.text: The bed said it is okay we'll tell you this that there wasn't enough slats in my bed set I use a hockey stick to as a fifth slat I did not want to put a spring box underneath my mattress it extremely comfortable as is nice having a bed close too be ground
customer_reviews.author: Adpdragonz

customer_reviews.title: No longevity on this item
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in 30 days time. The headboard couldn't connect to the actual frame due to the wood on the frame being tore up and damaged. It literally crumbled when I started to attempt to screw the headboard onto the frame. It fell after crumbling ,so its just a bottom base with a missing headboard now. Not worth the hundred bucks I paid. Now I have to spend and buy my child a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING quality for the price! Received much sooner than expected, was very simple to put together (only took me and my husband about 45 minutes), and looks phenomenal. Would highly recommend. Will be purchasing another for our spare room! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Wager

customer_reviews.title: Not what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a bed frame that does not need a box spring this is not for you. Huge gap between the head board and mattress and you can feel the wood slabs in your back when you lay down, absolutely needs a box spring. That being said the frame itself is sturdy and the fabric was in great condition. Honestly could have been a great purchase just too bad it was not even close to what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good frame for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's pretty good. All the components for the bed are inside the headboard when it arrives. The color is a light gray, not so much a cream like I thought it was going to be. One the pieces was a noticeably different shade of gray than the others. But that piece happened to be the least seen part of the bed so it worked out. Assembly definitely requires 2 people especially for the wood support beams. You will need your own screwdriver for that step. Overall, its concise and not bulky. Supports my queen mattress and box spring. Also supports me and husband just fine (approximately 500lbs of weight). Theres no creaking.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly but suffers from low quality wood and not enough slats to balance out weight distribution across the bed. If you have a roll up mail bed forget about it.. Sagging happens. If you're are a larger person don't bother. It broke for my daughter within 3 weeks....adding a true box spring to fix it up. Cosmetically its great... Just needs a few updates to perfect design.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great frame
customer_reviews.text: It's a great frame only thing that I would advise is to buy wooden slats to put under the bed because it only comes with 3 and it isn't enough if u only want to put a matress onto . But other then that's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a box spring!
customer_reviews.text: It needs a box spring! We weren't aware of that & paired it with just a memory foam mattress... One of the center support legs underneath broke off about 3 days after first usage. I had to put plywood in as there are just a few horizontal slats provided. Our fault, I suppose, but I feel it should be listed in the description that you NEED a box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed because I needed a bed for the guess bedroom in my home. I looked at the pics and the reviews and I was still a bit on the fence. Once I got this home and it was assembled I was soooo very happy with my choice. The price was within my budget price point and the look of the piece looks a lot more expensive then what I paid for it. Thanks for a really nice product and for saving me time from having to look around stores.
customer_reviews.author: wanda jack

customer_reviews.title: More support needed, but for the price can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice & for the price, awesome. I agree with the other reviews though, definitely will need to be reenforced with plywood for support, esp. if you have kids or "romp" around on your mattress. Not as easy to put together as other furniture I have assembled, but simple enough. Did it myself #girlpower, and all and all, I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kila

customer_reviews.title: I love my bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed it is exactly as described . I also bought the box spring on amazon to use with it. Put together metal box spring . My bed is super sturdy now Intend on purchasing 2 more beds. I coukdn't believe the price of the bed was so cheap. I'am so pleased was my best purchase on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Devona farley

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed for the price and easy to assemble. I am a 53 year old female and I was able to assemble it in a couple of hours and that is because I took my time.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Need extra support
customer_reviews.text: Frame is not bad, you will have to buy extra support for your mattress because the slacks will not last long, especially if your an adult with a husband/boyfriend if you get my drift. Other than that not bad for the price. My package didn’t come with the instructions I had to call the manufacturer to have them email it to me
customer_reviews.author: kesha G.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality junk - Rails are split - not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this bed is not well made and the bed rails are not very sturdy. One of them was actually split when I received it but they have not replaced it and want me to send back the old one even though I have a picture of the split rail. You can tell it was split and they painted over it with black paint to hide the split. You can also see that it is layers of split wood piled on top of each other. Not a good buy at all. Do not buy it as I am afraid it may fall apart. Not sturdy in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Clewell

customer_reviews.title: Not made good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a redo of my 16 year old daughters room. Looks nice but the center pieces are made of plastic! Has been up since February 29 and only lasted till May 2nd before the plastic on both sides of the bed bent and now the bed is lop sided and we have wood holding the sides of the bed up. If I could return it or exchange it I would. But now I'm having to buy her another bed frame. Not very happy about having to spend more money.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a super easy project. As a single female I found this bed super easy to assemble. All of the pieces were housed in the back of the headboard. The instructions were pretty basic and the pictures were a great help. The bed only took about an hour to complete. I have had the bed for about two weeks and I love it the only thing is that two of the slates were cracked and a few days ago when I sat on the edge of the bed I heard a crack. I think it is an easy fix to purchase a few pieces of wood from the hardware store can’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cole

customer_reviews.title: I like it...good price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good bed for the price it’s very sturdy. What pissed me off is, it was left outside my door in the rain and the delivery person didn’t even knock. The box was soaked and the bed did get wet. There was minor scrapes on headboard, few of the staples were hanging and a small tear. I contacted Amazon and instead of sending it back because it was too heavy and the box was damaged they just gave me a $10 credit. Not much but I do like the bed so far. My mattress didn’t fit perfect, a small gap but not very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Tykia

customer_reviews.title: Piece of cake to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I did not really read up on this item before buying and freaked out for a couple of seconds when I thought I only purchased the headboard. Everything to assemble the bed is zipped inside the headboard which is actually really nice! I loved that it came with everything labeled for easy assembly. I checked everything to make sure I wasn’t missing any parts before I started. I put it together in a little over an hour completely by myself. You do need an electric screw driver (easier) for the screws for the slats. Can’t review how sturdy it is as I just put it together today. Very impressed with how easy it was though!
customer_reviews.author: Alysse

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, soft, durable...I don't want to get off it!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!! I was so scared to buy online, didn't know what to expect especially for the price. It came in rolled up, about an inch thick, but once I cut the seal and let it rest and expand 24 hrs like it said too..I came home to a STUNNINGLY soft gorgeous mattress!!! I can't believe it honestly, it's far softer than the 1k one I bought at a furniture store. Its' Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Angelzfire3

customer_reviews.title: cheap material poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Two slats are an inch too short Has mildew or mold on it Wood is cracked Obvious water damage I didn’t see anything in reviews or description saying it needed box spring. In fact I saw it did NOT need one... it’s lot lower to floor than I expected (about an inch off floor) Need to buy plywood to stabilize the mattress
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiney K

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for a workout.
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying the box came a little banged up but the product inside was not damaged. Instructions are pretty easy if you follow each detail of the picture. Now the fun part. The slats seem pretty questionable. You are given tools for everything except the philips screw driver for slats. You should use a drill or be prepared to put some muscle into 8 unmarked not predrilled holes. There is no room for under the bed storage. Guess I'll go jump on the bed and see if I break it haha
customer_reviews.author: CASEY G.

customer_reviews.title: Unwanted extra space
customer_reviews.text: The headboard and foot board are very nice looking and as described. The support seems like it is not very sturdy. The biggest issue is the frame is too large. I purchased a full size and put a full size box spring and mattress on it and there is at least 3" extra space on the width (side to side) and length (top to bottom). The mattress set does not fit snug into the frame. Because the size is off and looks like the mattress is the wrong size for the frame I would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great bed frame..just make sure you tighten screws tight
customer_reviews.text: bed is sturdy..granted im notnjumling aroind on it but if youbput it together thr right waY and tighten the screws enough it will treat you right..only down side is thag assembly is all allen wrench which made it take longer, but as soon as i got to installing the cross boards under the matress i was able to use mybdrill and was done in 2 minutes after that...just make sure you toghten all them allen bolts up tight, once its tight with your hands get something else to help you tighten the wrench further theres still more tightening to go, if you do that you will be good
customer_reviews.author: Derek H.

customer_reviews.title: This was a such a waste of money ugh
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this bedframe for 4 months or less and it has completely fallen apart to the point I just have to throw it away. I got this for my 12 year old kid who is 5" 120LBS. all of the border holding up the frame has broken in half and the hinges have broke as well. I'm so disappointed now I have to buy a new frame for him. I JUST BROUGHT IT UGH
customer_reviews.author: 90s7ife

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed looks really nice once assembled but it doesn’t seem that sturdy and I have a 10” mattress. The mattress is so far from the bottom of the headboard that there is a huge gap which I was unaware of. It looked awkward and the pillows would fall through. The description states you don’t need a box spring but you definitely do unless you have a really thick and high mattress. I ended up purchasing a 5” box spring in order to eliminate the huge gag.
customer_reviews.author: christina r byfield

product_meta.title: Crown Mark Erin Upholstered Panel Bed in Stone Khaki, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:StoneClean line style with neutral upholstery lets this bed fit a variety of decors. The frame is lightly padded with wooden feet. The headboard and footboard feature baseball stitch details.
feature_bullets: Complete bed with headboard, footboard, and rails
Clean line style with neutral upholstery lets this bed fit a variety of decors.
Crafted with a manufactured wood and plywood frame; upholstered with polyester-blend fabric in a neutral stone khaki tone.
Easy assembly; All parts for making the bed are located in the back of the headboard
Designed for use with a box spring and mattress (not included)
Dimensions: 50.0" H x 86.6" L x 64.4" W

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars7,716 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
